main event: On January 3, 1958, two women reported observing an unidentified flying object while driving on Louisiana Highway 112 between LeCompte and Forest Hill, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped with four glowing points, moving silently in a zigzag pattern,The estimated size of the object varied, with one stating it was about the size of a basketball,Another stated it hovered for a while before rapidly disappearing,The witnesses were reputable citizens and school teachers from Leesville,The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes and occurred at night.
sighted object: oval-shaped object with four glowing points
witness description: Mrs. William H. Clement and Mrs. Joseph Oschwald, both college graduates and school teachers.
